article:
The library support:
Shape nodes (Line, Rectangle, Polygon, Polyline, Arc, Circle, Ellipse, QuadCruce, CubicCurcve, path, SVGPath)
Region nodes, including Controls
ImageView nodes
Group nodes
Shape3D nodes (by converting them to images)
Clips are supported.
Gradients are not supported for the moment
Animations are not supported for the moment
